steps.step_name: I have a configuration file with "title" set to "Hello World"
steps.glue_code:
do |key, value|
  config = \
    if source_dir.join("_config.yml").exist?
      SafeYAML.load_file(source_dir.join("_config.yml"))
    else
      {}
    end

do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end

steps.step_name: I should get a zero exit status
steps.glue_code:
do
  step %(I should see "EXIT STATUS: 0" in the build output)
end

do |dir, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to_not exist
  end

do |dir, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to_not exist
  end

do |dir, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to_not exist
  end

do |negative, text, file|
  step %(the "#{file}" file should exist)
  regexp = Regexp.new(text, Regexp::MULTILINE)
  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    expect(file_contents(file)).to match regexp
  else
    expect(file_contents(file)).not_to match regexp
  end

steps.step_name:
I have a default layout that contains "
Tom Preston-Werner
{{content}}"
steps.glue_code:
do |name, type, text|
  folder = type == "layout" ? "_layouts" : "_theme"

  destination_file = Pathname.new(File.join(folder, "#{name}.html"))
  FileUtils.mkdir_p(destination_file.parent) unless destination_file.parent.directory?
  File.write(destination_file, text)
end

do |directory|
  collections_dir = File.join(source_dir, directory.to_s)
  FileUtils.cp_r Paths.source_dir.join("test", "source", "_methods"), collections_dir
  FileUtils.cp_r Paths.source_dir.join("test", "source", "_thanksgiving"), collections_dir
  FileUtils.cp_r Paths.source_dir.join("test", "source", "_tutorials"), collections_dir
end

steps.step_name: I have the following documents under the puppies collection

do |folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    filename = "#{title}.md"
    dest_folder = "_#{folder}"

    path = File.join(dest_folder, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end

      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

test_case: Basic site with a post

steps.glue_code:
do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end

do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

do |args|

steps.step_name: I have an "index.html" page that contains "{% for member in site.data.team_members %}{{member.name}}{% endfor %}"
steps.glue_code:
do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end

do |file, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(file)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(file)).to_not exist
  end

do |negative, text, file|
  step %(the "#{file}" file should exist)
  regexp = Regexp.new(text, Regexp::MULTILINE)
  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    expect(file_contents(file)).to match regexp
  else
    expect(file_contents(file)).not_to match regexp
  end

do |negative, text, file|

  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    expect(file_contents(file)).to match regexp

  end

test_case: Preview a draft

steps.step_name: I have a configuration file with "permalink" set to "none"
steps.glue_code:
do |key, value|
  config = \
    if source_dir.join("_config.yml").exist?
      SafeYAML.load_file(source_dir.join("_config.yml"))
    else
      {}
    end

do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end

do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end

steps.step_name: I should get a zero exit status
steps.glue_code:
do
  step %(I should see "EXIT STATUS: 0" in the build output)
end

do |dir, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to_not exist
  end

steps.step_name: I have a default layout that contains "{{ site.time | date_to_xmlschema }}"
steps.glue_code:
do |name, type, text|
  folder = type == "layout" ? "_layouts" : "_theme"

  destination_file = Pathname.new(File.join(folder, "#{name}.html"))
  FileUtils.mkdir_p(destination_file.parent) unless destination_file.parent.directory?
  File.write(destination_file, text)
end

    end

steps.step_name: I have a "_plugins/ext.rb" file with content
steps.glue_code:
do |file, text|
  File.write(file, text)
end

do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end

do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end

test_case: Include a file relative to a post

steps.glue_code:
do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end

do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end

do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

test_case: Produce correct output site

steps.glue_code:
do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end

do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end

do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

steps.step_name: I have the following post within the "collections" directory
steps.glue_code:
do |type, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])

    filename = type == "draft" ? "#{title}.markdown" : "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.markdown"

    path = File.join(folder, "_#{type}s", filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end

steps.glue_code:

steps.step_name: I have an "index.html" page that contains "Index - {% for post in site.posts %} {{ post.content }} {% endfor %}"
steps.glue_code:
do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end

do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end

      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])

      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"

  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)

      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

steps.step_name: I have a configuration file with "highlighter" set to "rouge"
steps.glue_code:
do |key, value|

    if source_dir.join("_config.yml").exist?
      SafeYAML.load_file(source_dir.join("_config.yml"))
    else
      {}
    end

do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end

do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end

steps.step_name: I have a configuration file with
steps.glue_code:
do |table|
  table.hashes.each do |row|
    step %(I have a configuration file with "#{row["key"]}" set to "#{row["value"]}")
  end

do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end

do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end

steps.step_name: I have an "index.html" page that contains "{{ site.posts.first.title }}: {{ site.posts.first.url }}"
steps.glue_code:
do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end

test_case: Complicated site that puts it all together

steps.step_name: I have a configuration file with "theme" set to "test-theme"
steps.glue_code:
do |key, value|
  config = \
    if source_dir.join("_config.yml").exist?
      SafeYAML.load_file(source_dir.join("_config.yml"))
    else
      {}
    end

do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end

do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
